citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A bottle of expired liquid meloxicam (expiration date of June 2024) was presented for inspection. The licensee stated the
analgesic medication was used post-operatively for a couple of male sugar gliders that underwent neuter procedures
within the past month, but was unaware the medication had expired. Use of an expired medication that may have lost
potency and be less effective is not an appropriate method of adequate veterinary care. The facility must ensure adequate
veterinary care that includes the use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries.
Correct from this date forward of 22 October 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A bottle of expired liquid meloxicam (expiration date of June 2024) was presented for inspection. The licensee stated the 
analgesic medication was used post-operatively for a couple of male sugar gliders that underwent neuter procedures 
within the past month, but was unaware the medication had expired. Use of an expired medication that may have lost 
potency and be less effective is not an appropriate method of adequate veterinary care. The facility must ensure adequate 
veterinary care that includes the use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries.  
 
Correct from this date forward of 22 October 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
